alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Nottoway; Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 6:25PM EDT until May 27 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PRINCE EDWARD...NORTHWESTERN LUNENBURG AND WEST CENTRAL NOTTOWAY COUNTIES... At 624 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hampden Sydney College, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Hampden Sydney College around 635 PM EDT. Green Bay around 640 PM EDT. Burkeville and Rice around 655 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Briery Creek Lake, Prince Edward Station, Briery, Twin Lakes State Park, Nutbush, Burkes Tavern, Scholfield, Moran, Virso and Meherrin. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
